Description: Avant's newly renovated one, two and three bedroom apartments and townhomes are located in Annandale, Virginia, just inside the Beltway and conveniently close to everything including DC, Alexandria, Fair Oaks Mall, and Dulles and Reagan airports, just to name a few. Here, you'll find space to live. A better quality of life. And the freedom to just be yourself. That's what living at the Avant is all about. Discover how liberating it can be to have the comfort you crave at a value you deserve. Step outside your home and into a whole new world of amenities and services. Dive into the pool. Take a stroll along the tree-lined streets. From work to play, from care to carefree, the Avant has it all. And the picturesque setting near area parks and natural attractions means there's always something new to discover. Plus, you'll have an easy commutes wherever you want to go. Shopping sprees at Tysons. Romantic dinners in historic Alexandria. The buzzing nightlife of Clarendon. Countless events and attractions in DC. All of these - and more - are within easy reach of the Avant. Whether you're looking for fun or work, you'll find it all here.

Description: Ravensworth Towers in Annandale, Virginia offers smoke free living close to DC. Our pet friendly apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, spacious living areas, walk in closets, carpet, tile floors, private patio or balcony, in home stackable washer and dryer, central A/C and heat. Select homes offer upgraded maple cabinets, stainless steel appliances, dual entry kitchen, breakfast bar, pantry and/or den. Our community offers an outdoor swimming pool, sundeck, 24 hour fitness center, on site recycling, picnic/barbecue areas, clubhouse with large HDTV, and complimentary coffee bar. We are close to I 395 and I 495, near Little River Shopping Center, dining, entertainment and 7 bus lines with access to the Metro. We are 20 minutes from Reagan National Airport and 30 minutes from Dulles International. Guarantors welcome!
